display_long_description:
Welcome to Rocket Taggers!

Get ready to run, jump, and fly around in an exciting virtual world where the main goal is simple: don’t get tagged! Rocket Taggers is all about having fun with others in VR, whether you're playing tag, showing off, or just hanging out.

In Rocket Taggers, you can join other players, make new friends, and enjoy smooth movement that makes every round exciting. The game has one big map designed for climbing, jumping, and fast movement. It's perfect for learning the game and pulling off cool tricks while you try to escape or catch other players.

You can also buy fun cosmetics to change how your character looks. Wear cool hats, outfits, and more to stand out and show your style. It’s a great way to express yourself and have fun with your furry friends or anyone you meet in the game.

Even though Rocket Taggers is still in beta, there’s already a lot to do. We’re always working on updates and listening to player feedback to make the game better. More maps, features, and cosmetics are planned for future updates!

If you enjoy games like tag, parkour, or just hanging out in VR, you’ll have a great time in Rocket Taggers. Jump in, meet new people, and see what all the fun is about. This is just the beginning – and you're part of the journey!
